text: Wojciech Pałuka (died May 31, 1355) was a Roman Catholic priest from Poland.Piotr Nitecki, Biskupi Kościoła w Polsce w latach 965–1999. Słownik biograficzny, (Warszawa, 2000). Canon in Poznań, Gniezno, Krakow, Płock, Wrocław. Designated bishop of Poznań from 1346–1355, consecrated on January 28, 1347, and approved by the pope in 1348. He took part in delineating the Polish-Teutonic border, he also obtained royal privileges for the diocese. ==References== Category:Bishops of Poznań Category:Year of birth unknown Category:14th-century births Category:1355 deaths Category:14th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Medieval Polish nobility Category:14th-century Polish people
title: Wojciech Pałuka
